8 class _nout args : public narr {
9 NAMU(CLASS(args, narr))
10
11 public:
12 args() {}
13 args(const baseObj& me): _me(me) {}
14 args(const narr& rhs): super(rhs) {}
15 args(const baseObj& me, const narr& rhs): super(rhs), _me(me) {}
16
17 public:
18 const me& setMe(const node& me) const {
19 _me.bind(me);
20 return *this;
21 }
22 node& getMe() const { return *_me; }
23
24 std::string asStr() const {
25 std::string ret;
26 nbool first = true;
27 for(const auto& e : *this) {
28 ret += (first ? "" : ",") + e.getType().getName();
29 first = false;
30 }
31
32 return ret;
33 }
34
35 clonable* deepClone() const override {
36 me* ret = new me();
37 for(auto e=this->begin(); e ;e++)
38 ret->add((node*) e->clone());
39
40 ret->_me = _me;
41 return ret;
42 }
43
44 private:
45 mutable str _me;
46 };
